info.title: Intercom API Flows
info.description: Flows for all 108 Intercom API operations.

parameters.name: created_at_after
parameters.description: Start timestamp (UNIX) for admin activity logs.

flows.title: Compound Flow: Create User and Send Welcome Message
flows.description: This compound flow first creates a new user in Intercom and then sends a welcome message to that user. It orchestrates the 'intercom_create_user' and 'intercom_create_message' operations.

body.description: The content of the welcome message.

success.description: Compound response containing the outcome from both actions.
